name: Pocket Dogfights
description:
Fly the unfriendly skies in Pocket Dogfights!

Blast back to the early days of gaming with Pocket Dogfights! A game of oldschool aerial combat, inspired by arcade gaming, when skill was all that mattered.

Engage and destroy waves of enemy fighters, jets & bombers. Collect power-ups from destroyed enemies to help turn the tide of battle.

Want more news on updates?

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/PocketDogfights
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/PocketDogfights

Having problems? Want to send over some feedback? Drop an email to pocketdogfights@zerobyt.es and I'll do my best to help out.
